metadata.title: CVE-2022-48990 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amdgpu: fix use-after-free during gpu recovery[Why]    [  754.862560] refcount_t: underflow; use-after-free.    [  754.862898] Call Trace:    [  754.862903]  <TASK>    [  754.862913]  amdgpu_job_free_cb+0xc2/0xe1 [amdgpu]    [  754.863543]  drm_sched_main.cold+0x34/0x39 [amd_sched][How]    The fw_fence may be not init, check whether dma_fence_init    is performed before job free
